member.name: SHELL_UI_COMPONENT
member.summary: Identifies the type of UI component that is needed in the shell.

member.name: SHELL_UI_COMPONENT.SHELL_UI_COMPONENT_TASKBARS
member.summary: This UI component is a taskbar icon.

member.name: SHELL_UI_COMPONENT.SHELL_UI_COMPONENT_NOTIFICATIONAREA
member.summary: This UI component is an icon in the notification area.

member.name: SHELL_UI_COMPONENT.SHELL_UI_COMPONENT_DESKBAND
member.summary: This UI component is a deskband icon.
